aboutMe: Passionate about coding and technology, with a strong focus on creating efficient and scalable web applications.

description: Developed and maintained web applications using Python, Django, React, and Redux.
Led a team of developers in agile development practices.
Optimized applications for maximum speed and scalability.
Implemented responsive web design with HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript.
Worked on cross-platform applications using React Native.
Collaborated closely with design teams to create user-friendly interfaces.

education.title: Bachelor's in Computer Science
description: Specialized in web technologies and software engineering.
Completed a thesis project on 'Building Scalable Web Applications'.

projects.title: E-commerce
description: Developed a full-featured e-commerce website using React, Redux, and Django.
Implemented secure user authentication and payment processing.
Optimized for mobile and desktop platforms.

projects.title: Chat Application
description: Built a real-time chat application using Node.js, Socket.io, and React.
Focused on efficient data transmission and low-latency communication.
Deployed on AWS with scalability in mind.
